name: 2D Escape Room
description:
A top down 2D escape room game that have fun puzzles that you can solve.

This game is developed during the 2 weeks period of an even called Gameathon 2020.

Character Movement Control: W, A, S, D to move up, left, down, right.

Press Q in keyboard anytime you want to exit the application.

Link Hosted on GitHub: Link
